flawed_nl_solution:
When Dianne turns 30, Alex will be 30 x 2 = <<30*2=60>>60 years old.
Allison will be 30/2 = <<30/2=15>>15 years old then.
Dianne will turn 30 in 30 - 16 = <<30-16=10>>10 years.
Currently, the age of Alex is 60 - 10 = <<60-10=50>>50.
Currently, Allison is 15 - 10 = <<15-10=5>>5 year old.
So, the sum of Alex and Allison's ages now is 50 + 5 = <<50+5=55>>55 years old.
#### 55

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
